item.title: Komodo 9 Released: Better, Faster, Stronger
item.description: We're happy to announce that we've just released Komodo 9, so we're celebrating the evolution of Komodo: now better, faster, and stronger than ever! On top of already being a multi-language, cross-platform, kick-a$$ IDE, **new features in Komodo 9**...

item.title: Komodo 9 RC Now Available!
item.description: We've completed the big feature work for Komodo IDE 9, and we'll focus on bug fixes and polishing for the final release, so please help us out by giving Komodo 9 release candidate a try and report any issues you run into.

item.title: Come and join the Komodo development team!
item.description: We are looking for a really talented software engineer (aka developer) to join the Komodo team.

item.title: Logging Time in Komodo with WakaTime
item.description: I'm sure many of our users use time tracking software on a daily basis, using all sorts of tools to get the job done.

item.title: Tracking Editor Changes in Komodo 9
item.description: A change-tracker has been a common item on the Komodo wish-list for about as long as there's been a Komodo editor.

item.title: Komodo 9 Beta Release Now Available!
item.description: We've completed most of the big feature work for Komodo IDE 9, and we'll mainly be focusing on bug fixes and polishing for the final release, so please help us out by giving Komodo 9 beta a try and report any issues you run into.

item.title: Go-lang Support for Komodo
item.description: There has been a Komodo Go add-on available for a while now, but for Komodo 9 will be including the go-lang add-on in the default Komodo builds and improving Komodo's support for go programming.

item.title: Live Markdown Preview in Komodo
item.description: Since the Komodo team has been using GitHub more and more, we've been writing a lot more Markdown content.

item.title: Komodo IDE Personal is Here to Stay!
item.description: Good news everyone! Since we introduced Komodo IDE Personal a few months ago as a limited time offer, we have received lots of great feedback.

item.title: Multi-row Editor Tabs for Komodo
item.description: This is a JavaScript macro (best to set the macro to trigger on the Komodo startup event) that wraps your editor tabs into multiple rows, making all the tabs visible at once: https://github.com/Komodo/macros/blob/master/editor_tabs_multiple_rows.

item.title: Enhancing Productivity with Command Line Applications through Komodo Macros
item.description: This blog was contributed by a community member click here if you are interested in blogging on komodoide.

item.title: Introducing kopy.io
item.description: Today we finally launched kopy.io after having had it in soft-launch for about 2 weeks. kopy.io is a new "service" for Komodo. Essentially it is a pastebin alternative with a bunch of little extras you likely wont find in other pastebin solutions.

item.title: The History of Komodo, A Trip Down Memory Lane
item.description: Jump To: Version 0.x - 2000 to 2001 Version 1.x - 2001 to 2002 Version 2.x - 2002 to 2004 Version 3.

item.title: Macro for Toggling Editor Comments
item.description: This is an on-demand Python macro (most useful with a keybinding) that will allow you to toggle comments on/off over the selected editor lines (or the current editor line when there is no selection).

item.title: Komodo 8.5.4 release is now available
item.description: On behalf of the Komodo team, I am happy to announce the release of Komodo 8.5.4. This build contains important bug fixes and is a recommended update for all Komodo 8 users.
